ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is the way We reward good-doers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That is how We reward the good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus do We reward those that do good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thus do We reward the righteous ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is how We reward the virtuous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, thus We reward the Muhsinin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely thus do We reward the doers of good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Even so do We recompense the good-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus do We reward the good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: this is how We reward those who do good."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! in this wise We recompense the well-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thus do We reward the virtuous.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus do We certainly reward the Doers of Good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, thus We reward the Muhsinun (good-doers).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As such We recompense those who did good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is how We reward the doers of good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:44] Indeed so, in the same way that We reward the God-fearing, do We reward the virtuous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus do We reward the good) in words and deeds.
